alert.note: Alert for Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:12PM CDT until August 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SCOTT COUNTY... At 912 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Modoc, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scott City, Shallow Water, Grigston, Scott State Lake and Modoc. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
